name: kraden
quote: I'm hungry.

name: mia
quote: What, is there a pharmacy down there?

name: felix
quote: What?

name: ivan
quote: We did it because we're us!

name: sheba
quote: I thought you couldn't interfere in humans affairs. So get out of our way.

name: sheba
quote: But, Jenna... Aren't you and Isaac an item?

name: innkeeper
quote: You got to be kidding me. Go sleep in your own home!!

name: tret
quote: Hroooom!

name: kraden
quote: Ahem! Forgive my interrupting your interruption.

name: briggs
quote: Neener neener bleah!

name: obaba
quote: Kids today. So mistrustful.

name: jenna
quote: Aren't you... FROM Lemuria? Shouldn't you know exactly where it is?

name: kraden
quote: Pah! Older than me?! Inconceivable!

name: kraden
quote: What!? Are you INSANE!? Or maybe you think you're funny? Because you're not! Maybe this whole quest is just a game to you but it's not to me! Are you bored!? Do you want to go home!? FINE! That's it! Then let's go home!

name: valukar
quote: I am the guardian of fire. If you want my power, prove yourself in my crucible of flame.

name: sentinel
quote: I am the guardian of wind. If you would claim my power, you prove your worth.

name: starmagician
quote: I am the guardian of water. If you would claim my power, you must prove your worth.

name: dullahan
quote: I am the shadow, the keeper of light. If you want the sun's power, show me your own.

name: karst
quote: Your hand... so warm... People have such warm hands... I had forgotten...

name: isaac
quote: Oh. It's you guys.

name: feizhi
quote: You're a mean old man. It is not polite to tease me.

name: kraden
quote: The Golden Sun!? What is that?

name: sheba
quote: A three-headed dragon? THAT'S your miracle?

name: kraden
quote: I can only hazard a guess... The Wise One... wanted to test you.

name: megan
quote: You're a meanie! I don't tell meanies anything!

name: hama
quote:
Have you not learned? One's actions do not always reveal one's
            true intentions.

name: hama
quote: Appearances can be an illusion... The Wise One has a caring heart.

name: masked felix
quote: Relax... You will not be hurt.

name: menardi
quote: Who do you think you're talking to? You owe us your life!

name: angry tret
quote: Fools!

name: the wise one
quote: You are not all-powerful, Alex. Your power has its limits, as does your life.

name: puelle
quote: May your journey home be safe and uneventful...

name: puelle
quote: You've been through many trials, more than any of us can ever know...

name: isaac
quote: That's enough... I knew what I was doing the moment I raised my sword. We defied the Wise One in order to save the world. Our parents would understand.

name: flint
quote: Meanie! I don't care what you say! I'm coming along with you!

name: garet
quote: Ahh! My mind... Stop reading my mind, Ivan!!!

name: the wise one
quote:
That is correct. I cannot stop you.

But... what if some miracle were to occur, one that prevented you from igniting the beacon?

name: saturos
quote: You have endured so much, and now you want to throw your lives away? Fine. If that is your wish, prepare to have it granted.

name: saturos
quote: Match me? Pah! You think you can match the great Saturos?

name: saturos
quote: Me? Beaten? Never! I lost to this lighthouse, not to you!

name: alex
quote: And I doubt you are the type to 'finish' anyone off!

name: saturos
quote: I look forward to our next battle!

name: mccoy
quote: They call themselves warriors...but they're naught but wee children!

name: mccoy
quote: We cannae send yeh intae certain doom.

name: tret
quote: Oh... Mmmmm...

name: tret
quote: Hroom!

name: hama
quote: No, not sister... Do not think of me as your sister until you have fulfilled your destiny.

name: sheba
quote: I thought that if I went to Jupiter Lighthouse, I would learn who I was...

name: isaac
quote: Listen, this is Felix's quest now... We're just doing what we can to help out...

name: isaac
quote: Wait for the end of the world to come or wind up accidentally triggering it ourselves... What a choice...

name: ivan
quote: Isaac's been worrying about Jenna nonstop since this nightmare began! How could she run away from him like that?

name: isaac
quote: I never stopped trusting you, Jenna. I'll be waiting for you in Contigo.

name: karst
quote: You've betrayed us, and treason deserves  death!

name: karst
quote: We would never do anything as terrible as breaking our word... as you have done so casually.

name: agatio
quote: We've got the Mars Star! We don't need you anymore!

name: karst
quote: Your job is done now.

name: karst
quote: Poor dear... You look puzzled. Would you like to know why we don't need you?

name: karst
quote: I am filled with rage, but not so much as to be blinded by it.

name: agatio
quote: Ha! You're a fool! Never let concern distract you in battle!

name: isaac
quote: If you're not here to help my friend, then get out of my way, so I can do it myself!

name: moapa
quote: Felix, Jenna, Sheba, and Piers. I shall remember those names. We do not forget the names of heroes who can defeat me in fair combat.

name: moapa
quote: After many years, the vow that Hoabna made to Yegelos has at last been fulfilled!

name: felix
quote: Why?

name: moapa
quote: You seem confident, but it is your ignorance speaking.

name: sheba
quote: I can be every bit as heroic as some guy!

name: sheba
quote: This will be a breeze.

name: hsu
quote: I want to scream. But Feizhi does not like it when I do that.

name: feizhi
quote: Stubborn old man.

name: hama
quote: Felix bears a terrible fate, a burden I would not wish on any man.

name: karst
quote: Using Psynergy on me? Are you so dense that you don't know when to be afraid? I don't have time to play games with you. Now, leave me to my thoughts!

name: karst
quote: What do you take me for? I'm a warrior, like my sister...I can gauge a man's strength at a single glance. Even if you doubled Felix's power, he would still be no match for my sister.

name: sheba
quote: Wow. And I thought Saturos and Menardi had issues.

name: agatio
quote: They look like an unreliable bunch of ragamuffins.

name: alex
quote: I am on no one's side. My only concern is to see the lighthouse beacons lit once again.

name: jenna
quote: What did you mean!? Are you saying that I'm insensitive!?

name: kraden
quote: My! That was invigorating! He wasn't too strong... I never knew fighting could be so fun!

name: sheba
quote: Wa-Wait! Aren't you worried about me in the slightest? Did you rescue me from the lighthouse just to leave me for dead on this island?

name: sheba
quote: Oh, don't give me that sad face... You know I can't stay mad at you... After all, you did save me, Felix. I won't soon forget that...

name: garet
quote: Yeah, I know it's a rock, stupid!

name: sheba
quote: Aw... Poor baby...

name: captain
quote: Well, I'll need to call you something. Hmm... You look like Isaac.

name: garet
quote: Look! It's a man!

name: iodem
quote: Lord Babi, where have you gone?

name: iodem
quote: I have just seen Psynergy for the first time... It is an awesome power...

name: iodem
quote: They have greater power than you can even imagine.

name: thieve
quote: You must be joking! We stole this stuff fair and square!

name: kay
quote: Don't drink the water if it smells funny.

name: aaron
quote: He's a pig! He'll eat anything that's not tied down!

name: piers
quote: I'm from Lemuria... I've never had to get back INTO it before!

name: piers
quote: I've had it with your conspiracies! I will not tell you!

name: chaucha
quote: Is that the best you could come up with?

name: chaucha
quote: What!? Are they forcing you to eat this disgusting gruel?

name: aaron
quote: Ha ha! I got to see my brother crying!

name: babi
quote: My sudden appearance seems to have startled you.

name: babi
quote: Even the ruler of Tolbi has his limitations. Every year, I grow older and more frail... This body's had it.

name: babi
quote: I have my reasons...

name: babi
quote: I look forward to seeing you battle!

name: babi
quote: The battles at Colosso were spectacular!

name: babi
quote: If I had attained true immortality... There would be no need for all this research.

name: eoleo
quote: GA GA GA!

name: eoleo
quote: Goo. Goo goo ga

name: eoleo
quote: Baba babubu!!

name: eoleo
quote: Baba babubu!

name: eoleo
quote: Babu ba bubabu...

name: eoleo
quote: Waa waa waa!

name: eoleo
quote: Hooo... Ahhh waaah... WAHHH!

name: dodonpa
quote: Prepare to become monster fodder!

name: dodonpa
quote: Just a second longer, and you'd have been history!

name: mia
quote: I have failed in the one duty placed upon me..
